# CUSA13275.savepatch

### 1. Untested - Make sure to backup your save data first
### 2. Extra Lives

Target File: `*`

```
8001000C 6974656D
436F756E 745F3701
92000000 0000000C
08000000 0000007F
```

```
08000000 0000007F
```
